summary: REQ-5/6/7 appear implemented: MarketingHeader/MarketingFooter now render the provided external logo URL with alt text and a text fallback on load error; header brand remains a button navigating to '/'. SetupChecklistPage marks the Logo item as complete and references the exact URL. REQ-8 likely implemented for the standalone static page (header/footer logo image + text fallback), but the footer portion is not fully visible due to truncation.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed application routing including a new /admin/setup route (navigation structure change not requested).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly scoped changes to placing the provided logo; it also lists as non-goals not to change navigation structure or add new pages/routes beyond placing the logo.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (entry for "frontend/src/App.tsx": "route definitions for all pages including the new /admin/setup route")
